bookInfo.notes: Anonymous. By Daniel Defoe. Sometimes erroneously attributed to Robert Harley. With a half-title.

titleGroup.fullTitle: An essay upon publick credit: being an enquiry how the publick credit comes to depend upon the change of the ministry, or the dissolutions of Parliaments; and whether it does so or no. ...
